content.rendered:
We only ask that you allow Dumpster certain permissions in order to use the app correctly.

Here are the following permissions Dumpster requires, along with the reasons as to why it needs access to them: 

  • Storage: For accessing the device storage
  • Contacts: Only required for Dumpster Cloud activation

Please note, we do not ever access or use your data or files for internal purposes nor do we share it with others. Privacy is important to us. It’s what we do.
